levels.title: Beginner / Starter
levels.description: Я знаю кілька слів. Говорю повільно. Але мене вже чують.

modules.title: Welcome! Where are you from?

lessons.title: Hello! Present simple be: I, you
Two jobs. Present simple be: he, she it
Checking in. How to ... ask and answer simple questions
What’s your name? Singular and plural nouns; a, an; have, has

modules.title: People. Where are you now?

lessons.title: Where are they? Present simple be: we, you, they
Family and friends. Possessive adjectives
Small talk. How to ... have sport coversations
Best home cook. wh- questions + be

modules.title: Things. What's your favourite thing?

lessons.title: Favourites. Possessive's
What's on your desk? Present simple have + yes/no questions (l,you,we,they)
How much is it? How to ... shop for clothes
Shopping. Likes, dislikes and opinions

modules.title: Every day. What's your favourite music?

lessons.title: Time for lunch! Adverbs of frequency
A day in the life. Present simple: reqular verbs(he,she,it)
Can i have? How to ... order in a cafè
Earth from space. Present simple: yes/no questions (he,she,it)

modules.title: Action. Tell me about your job.

lessons.title: Good colleagues. Object pronouns
Yes, I can! Can for ability
Can you help me? How to ... make requests and offers
Birthday! Ordinal numbers; dates

modules.title: Where? Where are you and what can you see?

lessons.title: Lost Prepositions of place
A great place to live. There is, there are
Where are you? How to ... ask where a place is
The travel show. the

modules.title: Healthy lives. Do you eat healthy food?

lessons.title: The little things. Present simple: wh- questions
Heroes. Was, were
What's wrong? How to ... say you're not well
Focus on fitness. Imperatives

modules.title: Time out. How was your last holiday?

lessons.title: Weekend break. Past simple: reqular verbs
Going out, staying in. Past simple: irregular verbs
A ticket to ... ? How to ... buy a travel ticket
Kodo drummers. want, would like

levels.title: Elementary
levels.description: Я можу розповісти про себе. Помиляюся — і йду далі.

modules.title: Me and you. Who are you?

lessons.title: Hello! Present simple: I, you, we, they
Same but different. Present simple: he, she it
Lets's meet. How to ... make suggestions
Family and friends. Possessive 's, s'

modules.title: Lifestyle. What food do you like and dislike?

lessons.title: Can't live without it. Countable and uncountable nouns: a,an, same, any
Your lifestyle and you. Adverbs and phrases of frequency
Eating out. How to ... order a meal in a restaurant
The Indian relay. like, hate, love + -ing

modules.title: Home. Do you ever have visitors staying in your home?

lessons.title: Come in. This, that, these, those; here, there
Too much stuff. Have got
What can I bring? How to ... make invitations and offers
Your neighbourhood. There is, there are

modules.title: This world. Do you enjoy quizzes?

lessons.title: What a decade! Past simple of be: was,were
Life in numbers. How much, how many; how + adjective
Where can I get? How to ... get help in shops
Sakura time. Should, shouldn't; imperatives

modules.title: The past. When you were a child, what was your favourite thing?

lessons.title: Then and now. Past simple: regular verbs
What went wrong? Past simple: irregular verbs; wh- questions
Sorry, I am late How to ... apologise and make excuses
My weekend was ... Adjectives and modifiers

modules.title: Out and about. Where do you spend time when you are in town?

lessons.title: Meet me in town. Present continuous
My way. Comparative adjectives
Getting around. How to ... give directions
Cities: nature's new wild. Prepositions and adverbs of movement

modules.title: Work. What job would you most like to do

lessons.title: Odd jobs. Articles: a, an, the, zero
An extra day. Present simple and present continuous
I am calling to check ... How to ... phone for information
Would you like to ... ? Verbs and to infinitive

modules.title: Travellers. What place in the world would you most like to visit?

lessons.title: Trip advice. Superlative adjectives
Surprise travel. Be going to
At a hotel. How to ... make requests and offers in a hotel
Artic academy. Adverbs of manner

levels.title: Pre-Intermediate
levels.description: Навіть без слів я поясню. Головне — щоб ти зрозумів.

modules.title: My life. Where were you born and where do you live now?

lessons.title: Something in common. Questions
Nice job. Present simple and continuous
You can do it! How to ... encourage people
I love cooking! Verb + -ing form

modules.title: Help. What's your favourite animal?

lessons.title: To the rescue! Past simple and continuous
Oops! Definite article: the
How can I help? How to ... make and accept offers
Difficult situations. all, same, both, none of them

modules.title: Learn. What do you like reading?

lessons.title: A helping hand. Have to, don't have to, can't
I saw it on TV. Subject and object questions
Life hacks. How to ... give instructions and check understanding
School rules. Had to, didn't have to, couldn't

modules.title: Try this. When was the last time you tried something new?

lessons.title: I've never... Present perfect simple(1)
World record. Comparatives and superlatives
The perfect gift. How to ... make suggestions and recommendations
A taste of the Bayous. Verbs of sensation + adjective or like

modules.title: Things. Do you collect anything?

lessons.title: Lucky find. Possessive pronouns, whose, this/that, there/then
The world of 'slow'. Quantifiers
It's the best! How to ... talk about a product
Can you lend me your ... ? Verbs with two objects

modules.title: Fit and well. Which do your prefer - playing sport or watching ... ?

lessons.title: Sport for all. Adverbs of frequency and manner
Stressed! Present perfect simple(2)
How do you feel? How to ... talk about health problems
Driven: The Billy Monger Story. Be + adjective + to infinitive

modules.title: Downtime. What did you do last weekend?

lessons.title: Where shall we go? Present simple continuous with future reference; other future forms
Takeaway. Indefinite pronouns: someone, nothing, anywhere, etc...
At the exhibition. How to ... ask for and give permission
Nice picture! Adverbial and prepositional phrases

modules.title: Tomorrow. What kind of things do you use your phone for?

lessons.title: Blu-sky thinking. Will for predictions
Hopes and dreams. First conditional
Go green. How to ... check information
Tomorrow's food. Word building: nouns to adjectives

levels.title: Intermediate
levels.description: Я говорю про життя й плани. Іноді перемагаю граматику.

modules.title: People. How would your friends describe you?

lessons.title: Who are you? Present simple and present continuous; state verbs; adverbs of frequency
Good people. Ver patterns
Let's talk. How to ... start and end a coversation; keep a conversation going
Lifestyle. Modifiers

modules.title: Tale tellers. Tell me about a happy memory

lessons.title: What happened? Narrative tenses
Storytelling. Past simple and present perfect
A likely story. How to ... apologise and give reasons
The story of a place. prepositions of time

modules.title: Questions. What things are you curious about and why?

lessons.title: Facts and figures. Knowledge; verbs and nouns
Decisions. Future plans and intentions
Can I ask you ... ? How to ... make polite inquiries
What matterns most? Phrasal verbs

modules.title: Winners. Have you ever won anything?

lessons.title: Success. Modals for rules and advice
First! Articles
Taking part. How to ... explain rules and procedures
Top Gear: Nepal. Present perfect + superlative

modules.title: News. How do you get your news?

lessons.title: Fake news. Relative clauses
Newsmakers. Reported speech
Good news. How to ... give and respond to personal news
The future of news. Will, might and be going to for predictions

modules.title: Creators. What creative things do you do or are you interested in?

lessons.title: The two Pablos. Used to
Be creative. Comparatives and superlatives
Why do you think that? How to ... ask for and give opinions and reasons
An artist at work. Present perfect + for, since and yet

modules.title: Travel. Where do you feel happiest?

lessons.title: Good tourists. First and second conditionals
Globetrotters. Quantifiers
You must see ... ! How to ... make and respond to recommendations
Go solo? Reflexive pronouns

modules.title: Know-how. Are you good or bad at fixing things?

lessons.title: Doers and dreamers. Can, could, be able to
Video everywhere. Active and passive
Help! How to ... describe a problem and make recommendations
A gifted learner. -ing form

levels.title: Strong Intermediate
levels.description: Я можу пояснити, чому думаю так. І зробити це впевнено.

modules.title: Me & Mine. What's the best present you've ever received?

lessons.title: The story of me. Narrative tenses
Less is more? Verb patterns
Don't forget to ... How to ... leave phone messages
Your gadgets. Except for, apart from, (not) even

modules.title: Behaviour. What good habits do you have?

lessons.title: Change of habit. Present perfect continuous
People pleaser. Relative clauses
That's annoying! How to ... talk about things that annoy you
Planet Earth II. Jungles

modules.title: Working life. Where do you prefer to work or study?

lessons.title: Working from home. Conditional structures: unless, even if, in case(of)
Gig work. Necessity, obligation and permission
Good question. How to ... take part in an interview
This or that? Expressing preferences

modules.title: Fact or fiction?

lessons.title: Hoax! Past plans and intentions
Documentary. Indirect and negative questions
News. How to ... talk about the news
Fake friends. Conversations about fake friends

modules.title: Consumer. When was the last time you had a problem with a product or service?

lessons.title: The customer is always right? Clauses of purpose: to, so as to, in order to/that, so that
Too good to be true. Comparative and superlative structures
Which should I buy? How to ... summarise information from different sources
I do it myself. Causative have and get; reflexive pronouns

modules.title: Places. What's your favourite city?

lessons.title: In the city. So and such
Great journeys. Be/get used to
City transport. How to ... ask for and confirm information
A city of tommorow. What will you do tomorrow?

modules.title: Connect. What's your favourite word?

lessons.title: Mix-up. Reported speech
Oversharing. Passives
Conversation savers. How to ... keep a conversation going
A good communicator. Avoiding repetition: so, to, not, be

modules.title: Wisdom. What's the best piece of advice you've ever been given?

lessons.title: Wise words. Third conditional ans should have
Life lessons. Would
One thing i know ... How to ... give a presentation
Good story. Dragons' Den

levels.title: Upper Intermediate
levels.description: Я не боюся пауз. Я можу бути собою англійською.

modules.title: Identity. Who do you take after in your family?

lessons.title: My ID. Present perfect simple and continuous
Memory. Infinitive and -ing forms
I'd much rather. How to ... express personal preferences
Personality. While, whereas and whilst

modules.title: Different worlds. What impact does social media have on your life?

lessons.title: Real or virtual? Future probability
Closer to nature. Quantifiers
Amazing lives. How to ... speculate
The time traveller. It's time to travel!

modules.title: Showtime. What live events or performances do you enjoy and why?

lessons.title: Festival. Relative clauses
Performers. Cleft sentences
Binge-watch. How to ... use vague language
Music lover? Do and did for emphasis

modules.title: Lifestyle. Name one change you could make to your life to improve your health

lessons.title: Making changes. Future continuous and future perfect
Sleep. Passives
Keep moving. How to ... express agreement and disagreement
Ancient traditions. Conversations about traditions

modules.title: Work. Which professions do you admire and why?

lessons.title: First day! Past perfect simple and continuous
Change of plan. Past plans and intentions
You're on mute! How to ... describe problems and suggest solutions
Are you a team player? Non-defining relative clauses for comments

modules.title: Psychology. What things do you never find the time to get done?

lessons.title: Pay attention! Necessity, prohibition and permission
Quiet. Reported orders, requests and advice
Here's my advice. How to ... ask for advice and give advice tactfully
Would I lie to you? Better a bitter truth than a sweet lie

modules.title: Talent. Do you have any hidden talents?

lessons.title: An unexpected passion. Past modals of deduction
I wish. Wish, if only, should have
Let me explain. How to ... describe a process
Hard work or talent? Adverbials of concession

modules.title: Community. What does 'community' mean to you?

lessons.title: A new way of living. Participle clauses
If the world ... Conditionals with conjunctions
Online communities. How to ... develop an argument
Second shot. Can you shoot?

levels.title: Pre-Advanced
levels.description: Я змінюю стиль і настрій. Мова - мій інструмент.

modules.title: Connections. Which people, places or things are important to you and why?

lessons.title: New friends. Describing past and present habits
Places. Reduced relative clauses
Things we love. How to ... talk about hypothetical preferences
Comfort food. What is your favorite food?

modules.title: Competition. In what ways you competitive?

lessons.title: Getting away with it. Cleft sentences
Friend or foe? Ellipsis and substitution
In the workplace. How to ... compare and evaluate ideas
Challenge. It's your time!

modules.title: Inspiration. How do you express creativity in your life?

lessons.title: Fanfiction. As iflas though
Street chatter. No matter
Carrot or stick? How to ... engage with other people's views
Role models. Do you have any role models?

modules.title: Image. How important is image to you?

lessons.title: 'Selfie-expression'. Uses of should
Creating a brand. The continious aspect
Presenting yourself. How to ... steer a conversation towards a topic
Branding and behaviour. What type of person are you?

modules.title: Change. What changes have there been in your life recently?

lessons.title: Life-changing decisions. Mixed conditionals
Conservational change. The perfect aspect
Effecting change. How to ... summarise
Habits. What bad habits do you have?

modules.title: Oops! Tell me about a recent mistake you made and how you felt about it

lessons.title: Algorithm. Inversion
Online blunders. Passive structures
In dispute. How to ... negotiate in a dispute
Tech fail.

modules.title: Trends. Tell me about a recent trend in your country

lessons.title: The word on the street. Adverbials
Food fads. Fronting: reasons, causes and explanations
Pre-loved. How to ... exaggerate
Past and present.

modules.title: The future. Do you generally feel optimistic or pessimistic about the future?

lessons.title: Dystopias and utopias. Concession
The science we need. Future forms
Spend or save? How to ... maintain and end a discussion
Science fiction.

levels.title: Advanced
levels.description: Я думаю, жартую й відчуваю англійською. Це вже дім.

modules.title: Learning. What's one thing you think everyone should learn to do?

lessons.title: Is that a fact? Conditional forms
Tomorrow's learning. Nominal relative clauses
Creativity. How to ... manage interaction during a discussion
Learning experiences.

modules.title: Culture. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would you choose and why?

lessons.title: Cities. Advanced ways of comparing
Lost in translation. Reporting
The way we do it. How to ... maintain and develop interaction
Flavours.

modules.title: Working life. What's the best or worst job you have ever had?

lessons.title: Get that job! Modal verbs and phrases
Going remote. Passives
Tackling the real issues. How to ... check understanding by paraphrasing and summarising
Company culture

modules.title: Humanity. What human characteristics are the most important?

lessons.title: Pioneers. Verb patterns
Community. Continuous and perfect aspects
Economies. How to ... present survey results
Extinction.

modules.title: Influence. Who's the most famous person you've ever met?

lessons.title: First impressions. Giving emphasis: inversion, clefting, tailing, fronting

Role models.

modules.title: Classics. Are new things always better than old things?

lessons.title: Hidden gems. Narrative tenses review
Words and music. Adverbials

Design classics.

modules.title: Choice. What important decisions will you need to make over the next decade?

lessons.title: Decisions, decisions. Omitting words
Online or offline? Prepositional phrases

modules.title: Body and mind. Which quality do you like most about yourself?

lessons.title: No limits? Noun phrases
Bridging the senses. Uses of will and would
Feeling good. How to ... explain the purpose and benefit of something
Effects and illusions.
